title: Charmed

A Charmed creature can't harm the charmer, and the charmer has Advantage on Charisma Checks against the creature.

Charmed is a Status Effect in Baldur's Gate 3. Status Effects are the different conditions that can affect characters in both positive and negative ways.

Charmed Information

Effect: A Charmed creature can't harm the charmer, and the charmer has Advantage on Charisma Checks against the creature.
